root.title: CAM:Confusion Assessment Method
root.feature: Feature 1: Acute Onset or Fluctuating Course
root.question: Acute Onset or Fluctuating Course
root.explanation: Is there evidence of an acute change in mental status from the patientâ€™s baseline? Did the (abnormal) behavior fluctuate during the day, that is, tend to come and go, or increase and decrease in severity?
